channel.title: Take away the Inv,Emotes Etc
channel.description:
I Gotta be honest, i have no clue WHATSOEVER how to do this But im trying to make a jail to punish people.
Ive made the Actuall spot they will stand in but that wont stop them Teleporting out and since i have Teleports on Emotes and stuff like ::magic How can i stop a person from Talking AND accesing the Emotes Tab It Would be better if i can just Completly Block Their Interface and Words, Can you Help me please? And Thanks in Advance

item.title: Take away the Inv,Emotes Etc
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:5, topic:251391”]I don’t have the start of the command becuase I now do [508] coding and can’t remember Silab. Like this…

IgnoreCase(“Jail”)) {
mute = true;
teleblock = true;
sendMessage(“You’re now teleblocked and muted.”);
sendMessage(“You may get out… If I decide you might.”);[/quote]

no such thing as silab…

also do what rich said, find your chat void, and add if (Jailed) return;

its as easy as pie.

Read full topic

item.title: Take away the Inv,Emotes Etc
item.dc:creator: @dboy28 dboy28
item.description:
@dboy28 wrote:

[quote="_Ryan, post:2, topic:251391"]teleblock = true;
mute = true;[/quote]
Huh? I Dont get, Where do i put that, and i dont want it to Affect the Whole Game, just the person who is Jailed[quote="`Rich, post:3, topic:251391"]Edit the public chat and the actionbutton packets. Before the normal code is executed add something such as;

if (Jailed) return;[/quote]

huh, i dont get it? Where do i put that?

Read full topic

item.title: Take away the Inv,Emotes Etc
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Edit the public chat and the actionbutton packets. Before the normal code is executed add something such as;

if (Jailed) return;

@_Ryan3 wrote:

teleblock = true;
mute = true;
